title: BUSINESS_HOURS_NEXT_START_DATE
description: Returns the next Datetime business hours open after the specified target date; returns the target date itself if it's within business hours. The result is returned in UTC.

parameters.name: target_date
parameters.description: The Datetime from which to find the next start of business hours.

parameters.name: business_hours_name_optional
parameters.description: The name of the business hours. If omitted, the default schedule is applied.

examples:
BUSINESS_HOURS_NEXT_START_DATE(NOW(), "Weekday9to5")
-- Returns the current Datetime if it's within the "Weekday9to5" business hours; otherwise, returns the next opening Datetime
